item.description:
I am a fifth and final year PhD student advised by James Fogarty in Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington. I research how to use machine learning and data analytics to help people better understand and make decisions based on data, particularly within healthcare contexts.

I am on the job market! I am currently looking for industry applied science, data science, research scientist, and developer positions for a Fall 2022 start. Please reach out if you know of a potential position.
